dialog.text:
Emoji test - no need to respond
:angry: - angry, :blush: - blush, :cold_sweat: - cold sweat, :disappointed: - disappointed, :frowning: - frowning, :grinning: - grinning, :partying_face: - partying_face, :face_with_rolling_eyes: - roll eyes, :sleeping: - sleeping, :smiley: - smiley, :smiling_face_with_3_hearts: - smiley face with 3 hearts, :thinking_face: - thinking face, :wink: - wink, :woozy_face: - woozy face, :worried: - worried

joins.text: Detected a positive sentiment - well done :smile:
Detected a negative sentiment - that's sad :cry:

dialog.text: This is a second response.  Again there is no need to respond to this message (unless you want to).
This is a third response.  Again there is no need to respond to this message. If you reply to this message there should be no response.
